entry.title: $1797 // SUNLIGHT _ 1BR _LAUNDRY__BUILDING BROADWAY-38ST
entry.content:
** N E W B U I L D I N G **

LARGE 1 BEDROOM WITH GREAT SUNLIGHT

LARGE CLOSETS

MODERN OPEN STYLE LIVING ROOM OPEN INTO THE KITCHEN AREA
EAT - IN KITCHEN WITH LARGE WINDOWS

NICE LARGE BATHROOM AND GREAT SUNLIGHT

RENT INCLUDES HEAT AND HOT WATER

***LAUNDRY FACILITIES INSIDE THE BUILDING**
** BYCICLE STORAGE AREA
*** TENANT'S ATTENDANT

CLOSE TO BROADWAY N - W TRAIN
CLOSE TO STEINWAY STREET ,, R- M TRAINS
CLOSE TO MANY STORES , CAFES, RESTAURANTS, GYMS

TO VIEW EMAIL INCLUDE YOUR TELEPHONE NUMBER AND TIME TO SCHEDULE A VIEW**
